plot: A nightclub singer has nightmares about being involved in adultery and murder, only to wake up and find that they may not be nightmares.
title: Point of Terror
plot_es: A nightclub singer has nightmares about being involved in adultery and murder, only to wake up and find that they may not be nightmares.
plot_en: A nightclub singer has nightmares about being involved in adultery and murder, only to wake up and find that they may not be nightmares.
